name: Fun Crush
description:
Come to an exciting adventure in the world fun crush ! Match cubes and create powerful combos to blast the toy cubes! Solve puzzles and pass levels to get tons of rewards!

Feature Game :

Addictive level

- Hundreds of well-designed free levels and new levels that are constantly updated.

No time limit

- There is no time limit for you to solve your problems wholeheartedly and continue your journey.

Well-designed graphics

- Different beautiful game maps and good-looking graphic effects give you a great gaming experience.

Relaxed music

- Pleasant music and sound effects allow you to relax and have fun.
